hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: If you need assistance with using your school-issued chromebook, please call 918-684-3700 ext. 4357 (HELP) or email helpdesk@roughers.net with a description of your issue.

h3.div: Once you are on the phone with a technology support team member, please go to the following website on your school-issued chromebook:

ul.li: Students will click "Generate Code" to output a random 12 digit code that you will provide to the MPS support representative to allow access to your computer.
You will then receive a popup confirming that the support representative is accessing your chromebook. Click share.
The support representative will be able to remotely control your chromebook to provide assistance.
You may stop screen sharing at any time by clicking the "Stop" button in the bottom-right corner of your screen.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: Muskogee Public Schools. 202 W Broadway, Muskogee, OK 74401.
